title: WANT Elevators that open to your unit? PENTHOUSE Downtown Capitol Hill
neighborhood: Downtown Golden Triangle Capitol Hill Uptown
posting_body: ['Welcome to the biggest Penthouse in Colorado!', '4000 sq ft inside + outside space!', '2 FREE Parking SPOTS!', 'This is a one of a kind Top Floor Penthouse unit.', 'ELEVATORS OPEN TO YOUR UNIT!', 'ALL City and Mountain Views!', 'This Penthouse will go Super Fast!', 'Reserve it today!', 'Text or Call for Showings ASAP!', 'Community FeaturesSpectacular Views of the Front Range and Downtown Denver*', 'Fully Equipped Fitness Center  | Fitness On Demand  | Yoga and Group Fitness Studio  | Communal Gathering Kitchen  | Party/Game Room  | Cyber Cafe | Conference Room with A/V Connections  | Refreshing Pool  | Dog Spa  | Gear Up: Interior Heated Bike Storage Onsite Maintenance and Office TeamUpdated FinishesContemporary Vinyl Plank Flooring and Plush Carpet | Quartz Counters in Kitchen and Bathrooms | Stainless Steel Appliances | Contemporary Kitchens with Dishwashers* | Central Heat and Air Conditioning | Private BalconiesPet Friendly Covered and Off-Street Parking | Additional storage', "LoDo, RiNo, LoHi, Highlands, SoBo, Baker, Capitol Hill, Ballpark District, Downtown, Central Business District, CBD, Cheesman Park, Congress Park, Governor's Park, Uptown, Cherry Creek, Speer, Five Points, Sloan's Lake, Civic Center, Commons Park, Jefferson Park, Denver Tech Center, DTC, Edgewater, Wash Park, Platte Park, City Park, Riverfront Park, Glendale, Confluence Park, Union Station, Golden Triangle, Lincoln Park, Littleton, Lakewood, Englewood, Centennial, Greenwood Village, Virginia Village*Restrictions may apply.", 'Pricing, availability and lease terms are subject to change without notice.', '**Restrictions apply.', 'Pricing and availability subject to change without notice**']
